text: Ær Cristes geflæscnesse lx wintra Gaius Iulius se casere ærest Romana Brytenland gesohte and Bryttas mid gefeohte cnysede, and hy oferswiðde and swa þeah ne mihte þær rice gewinnan.
AnnoOctauianus rixode lxvi wintra, and on þam lii geare his rices Crist wæs acenned.
Ða ðry tungolwitigan of eastdæle coman to þam þæt hie Crist weorðodan, and þa cild on Bethleem ofslegene wæran for Cristes ehtnesse fram Herode.
Her swealt Herodes fram him sylfum ofsticod, and Archelaus his sunu feng to rice.
Fram frymðe middangeardes oþ þis gear wæran agen v þusenda wintra and cc wintra.
Philippus and Herodes todæland Lysiam and Iudeam fyþerricum.
Her feng Tyberius to rice.
Her onfeng Pilatus gymene ofer Iudeas.
Her wæs Crist gefulwad and Petrus and Andreas gehwyrfde, and Iacobus and Iohannes and Philippus and þa xii apostolas.
Her wæs Crist ahangen fram frymðe middangeardes ymb v þusenda and cc and xxvi wintra.
Her wæs Sanctus Paulus gehwyrfed and Sanctus Stephanus oftorfod.
Her se eadiga Petrus se apostol gesæt bisceopsetl on Antiochia þære ceastre.
Her onfeng Gaius rice.
Her se eadiga Petrus se apostol gesæt bisceopsetl on Rome.
Her Herodes swealt, se þe Iacob ofsloh anum geare ær his agenum deaðe.
Her Claudius oþer Romana kyninga Brytene gesohte and þæne mæstan dæl on his geweald onfeng, and eac swylce Orcadius þa ealand Romana cynedome underþeodde.
Her Iacobusfrater Dominiþrowade.
Her Marcus se godspellere forðferde.
Her Petrus and Paulus þrowodan.
Her Uespassianus feng to rice.
Her Titus, Uespassianus sunu, on Hierusalem ofsloh Iudeacxiþusenda.
Her feng Titus to rice, se þe sæde þæt he þæne dæg forlure þe he naht to gode ne gedyde.
Her Domicianus, Tites broðor, feng to rice.
Her Iohannes se godspellere on Pathmo þam ealande awrat þa bocApocalipsis.
Her Simon se apostol wæs ahangen, and Iohannes se godspellere gereste on þam dæge in <Epheso>.
Her Clemens papa forðferde.
Her Ignatius bisceop þrowode.
Her Eleuther on Rome onfeng bisceopdome and þæne wuldorfæstlicexvwinter geheold.
To þam Lucius Brytene cyng sende bocstafas, bæd þæt he wære cristen gedon, and he þurhteah þæt þæt he bæd.
Her Seuerus onfeng rice and he rixodexviigear.
Se Brytenland mid dic forgyrde fram sæ oþ sæ.
Her Maximus se casere feng to rice, se wæs on Brytenlande geboren, and þanon he for in Gallia.
Her Gotan abræcan Romeburh, and næfre syððan Romane ne rixodan on Brytene.
Her Romane gesomnodan ealle þa goldhord þe on Brytene wæran, and sume on eorðan ahyddan þæt hy syððan nænig mann findan ne mihte, and sume mid him on Gallia læddan.
Her Palladius se bisceop wæs onsended to Scottum, þæt he heora geleafan getrymede, fram Calestino þam papan.
Her Mauricius and Ualentinus onfengon rice and rixodanviigear.
On heora dagum Hengest and Horsa fram Wyrtgeorne gelaþode, Brytta kyninge, gesohtan Brytene on þam stede þe is genemned Hypwinesfleot, ærest Bryttum to fultume, ac hy eft on hy fuhton.
Her Hengest and Horsa gefuhtan wið Wyrtgeorne þam kyninge on þære stowe þe is gecweden Æglesþrep, and his broðor Horsan man þær ofsloh, and æfter þam feng Hengest to rice and Æsc his sunu.

Her Hengest and æsc his sunu fuhton wið Bryttas on þære stowe þe is gecweden Creacanford and þær ofsloganiiiiþusenda wera, and þa Bryttas þa forletan Kentland and mid myclum ege flugon to Lundenbyrig.
Her Hengest and æsc gefuhton wið Wealas neah Wippedesfleote and þær ofsloganxiiWylisce ealdormen, and heora þær wearð an ofslegen, þam wæs nama Wipped.
Her Hengest and æsc gefuhton wið Wealas and genaman unarimedlicu herereaf, and þa Wealas flugan þa Engle swa swa fyr.

Her com ælle on Brytenland and his þry suna, Kymen and Wlencing and Cissa, mid þrim scipum on þa stowe þe is genemned Kymenesora, and þær ofslogan manige Wealas and sume on fleam bedrifan on þæne wudu þe is genemned Andredeslea.
Her ælle gefeaht wið Wealum neh Mearcredesburnanstæðe.
Her æsc feng to rice and wæsxxiiiiwintra Cantwara cing.
Her ælle and Cissa ymbsætan Andredesceaster and ofslogan ealle þa ðe þærinne wæran þæt þær ne wearð furþum an Bryt to lafe.
Her coman twegen ealdormen on Brytene, Cerdic and Cynric his sunu, midvscipum on þone stede þe is gecweden Cerdicesora, and þi ilcan dæge hie gefuhtan wið Wealum.
Her com Port on Brytene and his twegen sunu, Bieda and Mægla, mid twam scipum on þære stowe þe is nemned Portesmuþa and þær ofslogan anne Brittiscne man swiþe æþelne.
Her Cerdic and Cynric ofslogan anne Brittiscne cing þam wæs nama Natanleod andvþusenda wera mid him, þa æfter þam wæs þæt land genemned Natanleag a oð Cerdicesford.
Her coman Westseaxe on Brytene mid þrim scipum on þa stowe þe is gecweden Cerdiceshora, and Stuf and Wihtgar gefuhtan wið Bryttas and hie geflymdan.
Her Cerdic and Cynric rice onfengan, and þy ilcan geare hie gefuhton wið Bryttas þær man nemneþ Cerdicesford.
Her Cerdic and Cinric fuhtan wið Bryttas on þære stowe þe is gecweden Cerdicesleag.
Her Cerdic and Cynric genaman Wihte ealand and ofslogan fea men on Wihtgarabyrig.
Her Cerdic forðferde, and Cynric his sunu rixodexxviiwintra, and hie gesealdan heora twam nefum, Stufe and Wihtgare, Wihte ealand.
Her sunne aðeostredexiiiidagum ærKalendas Martiusfram ærmorgene oþ undern.
Her sunne aþeostrode onxii Kalendas Iulii, and steorran hie æteowdan fulneah healfe tid ofer undern.
Her Wihtgar forðferde, and hine man bebyrigde on Wihtgarabyrig.

Her Ida feng to rice, þanen Norðanhymbra kinecynn onwoc, Ida wæs Eopping, Eoppa Esing, Esa wæs Inguing, Ingui Angenwitting, Angenwit Alocing, Aloc Benocing, Benoc Brandring, Brand Bældæging, Bældæg Wodening, Woden Freoþolafing, Freoþelaf <Freoþewulfing>, Friþulf Finning, Finn Godulfing, Godulf Geating.
Her Cynric feaht wið Bryttas on þære stowe þe is genemned Searoburh, and þa Bryttas geflimde.
Cerdic wæs Cynrices fæder, Cerdic Elesing, Elesa Esling, Esla <Gewising>, Giwis <Wiging>, Wig Freawining, Freawine Freoþogaring, Freoþogar <Branding>, Brand Bældæging, Bældæg Wodening.
Her Cinric and Ceawlin <fuhtan> wið Bryttas æt Beranbyrig.
Her Ceaulin rice onfeng on Westseaxum, and ælle to Norðhymbrarice, and þæt heoldxxxwintra.

Ælle wæs Yffing, Yffe Uxfreaing, Uxfrea <Wilgisling>, Wilgisl Westerfalcing, Westerfalca Sæfugling, Sæfugel Sæbalding, Sæbald Sigegeating, Sigegeat Swebdæging, Swebdæg Sigegaring, Sigegar Wægdæging, Wægdæg Wodening.
Her Columba presbiter com of Scottum on Brittas, Peohtas to lærenne, and on Hii þam ealande minster worhte.
Her Ceawlin and Cuþa gefuhtan wið æþelbriht and hine on Kent geflimdan, andiiealdormen on Wibbandune <ofslogon>, Oslaf and Cnebban.
Her Cuðulf feaht wið Bryttas æt Biedcanforda and feower tunes genam, Liggeanburh and æglesburh and Bensingtun and Egonesham, and þy ilcan geare he gefor.

Her Cuðwine and Ceawlin fuhtan wið Bryttas andiiikingas ofslogan, Conmægl and Condidan and Farinmægl, on þære stowe þe is gecweden Deorham, and genaman þreo ceastra on heom, Gleawceaster and Cyrenceaster and Baþanceaster.
Her Ceawlin and Cuða fuhtan wið Bryttas on þæm stede þe man nemneð Feþanleag, and Cuþan man þær ofsloh, and Ceawlin manige tunas genam and unarimedlic herereaf, and yrre he hwearf þonon to his agnum.
Her ælle king forðferde, and æþelric rixode æfter himvgear.
Her Ceol rixodevgear.
Her wearð micel wælfyll æt Woddesbeorge, and Ceawlin wæs ut adrifen.
Her Ceawlin and Cwichelm and Crida forwurdan, and æþelferð feng to rice.
Her Gregorius papa sende to Britene Agustinum mid wel manegum munecum, þa Godes word Angla þeode godspelledan.
Her ongan Ceolwulf rixian on Westseaxum, and symble he feaht and wann oþþe wið Angelcynn oððe wyð Wealas oþþe wyð Peohtas oþþe wið Scottas.

Se wæs Cuþyng, Cuþa Kynricing, Cynric Cerdicing, Cerdic Elesyng, Elesa Esling, Esla Gewising, Gewis Wiging, Wig Freawining, Freawine Freoþogaring, Freoþogar Branding, Brand Bældæging, Bældæg Wodening.
Her sende Gregorius Agustine arcebisceope pallium on Brytene and wel manige godcunde lareowas him to fultume, and Paulinus bisceop gehwyrfde Eadwine Norþanhymbra kining to fulwihte.
Her wæs gefeoht æt Egesanstane.
Her Eastseaxe onfengon geleafan and fulwihtes bæð under Sæbrihte cinge and Mellite bisceope.
Her forðferde Gregorius ymbxgear þæs þe he us fulwiht sende.
His fæder wæs haten Gordianus and his modor Siluia.
Her Ceolulf feaht wið Suþseaxe.
Her Cynegils feng to rice on Westseaxum and heoldxxxiwintra, se Kynegils wæs Ceoling, Ceola Cuþing, Cuþa Cynricing.
Her Cynegils and Cwichelm gefuhton on Beamdune and ofsloganii<þusenda> Weala andxlv.
Her æþelbriht Cantwara king forðferde, and Eadbald his sunu feng to rice, and þi ilcan geare wæs agan fram frimðe middangeardesvþusenda wintra anddccc.
Her Paulinus fram Iusto þam arcebisceope wæs gehadod Norþanhymbrum to bisceope.
Her Eanflæd, Eadwines dohtor cinges, wæs gefullod on þone halgan hæfen Pentecosten.
And Penda hæfdexxxwintra rice, and he wæslwintra þa he to rice feng.
Penda wæs Pybbing, Pybba Creoding, Creoda Cynewalding, Cynewald Cnebbing, Cnebba Iceling, Icel Eomæring, Eomær Angelþeowing, Angelþeow Offing, Offa Wærmunding, Wærmund Wihtlæging, Wihtlæg Wodening.
Her Eadwine king wæs gefullod mid his þeode on Eastran.
Her Cynegils and Cwichelm gefuhtan wið Pendan æt Cyrenceastre and siþþan geþingodan.
Her wearð Eorpwald gefullad.
Her wearð Eadwine ofslegen, and Paulinus hwearf eft to Cantwarum and gesæt þær bisceopsetl on Hrofceastre.
Her Byrinus bisceop bodade Westseaxum fulwiht.
Her Cynegils king wearð gefullad fram Byrino þæm bisceope on Dorkeceastre, and Oswald his onfeng.
Her Cwicelm wæs gefullod on Dorkeceastre and þy ilcan geare forðferde, and Felix bisceop bodade Eastenglum Cristes geleafan.
Her Byrinus fullade Cuþred cing on Dorkeceastre and eac his onfeng him to sunu.
Her Eadbald Cantwara king forðferde, and he rixodexxvwintra.
Her Oswald Norðanhymbra king wæs ofslegen, and Kenwealh feng to Westsexanarice and heoldxxiwintra.
Se Kenwealh het atimbrian þa Ealdan Cyricean on Wintanceastre.
Her Paulinus forðferde, se þe wæs arcebisceop ær on Eoforwicceastre and eft on Hrofceastre.
Her Kenwealh king wearð ut adrifen fram Pendan cinge.
Her wæs Kenwealh gefullad.
Her Kenwealh gesealde Cuþrede his mægeiii<þusenda> hida landes be æscesdune.
Se Cuþred wæs Cwichelming, Cwichelm Cynegilsing.
Her ægelbriht of Galwealum æfter Byrine þam romaniscean bisceope onfeng bisceopdomes on Westseaxum.
Her Oswine king wæs ofslegen, and Aidan bisceop forðferde.
Her Kenwealh gefeaht æt Bradanforda be Afene.
Her Middelengle onfengon under Peadan ealdormenn rihtne geleafon.
Her Onna cyng wearð ofslegen, and Botulf ongan þæt menster timbrian æt Yceanho.
Her Penda forwearð, and Myrce wurdon Cristene.
Þa wæs agangen fram frymþe middangeardesvþusenda wintra anddcccandlwintra.
And Peada feng to Myrcnarice Pending.
Her forðferde Peada, and Wulfhere Pending feng to Myrcnarice.
Her Cenwealh gefeaht æt Peonnum wið Wealas and hi geflymde oþ Pederedan, þis wæs gefohten siððan he of Eastenglum com, and he wæs ðær on wræceiiigear.
Hæfde hine Penda adræfedne and rices benumene forþon he his <sweostor> anforlet.
Her ægelbriht gewat fram Cenweale, and Wine heold þone bisceopdomiiigear, and se ægelbriht onfeng Persa bisceopdomes on Galwealum be Signe.
Her Cenwealh gefeaht on Eastron on Posentesbyrig, and gehergode Wulfhere Pending on æscesdune.
And Cuðred Cwicelming and Cenbryht cing an anum geare forðferdon.

And on Wiht gehergode Wulfhere Pending, and gesealde Wihtwaran Aþelwolde Suðsexana cynge forþon Wulfhere hine onfeng æt fulwihte, and Eoppa presbiter be Wilferþes worde and Wulfhere cing brohte Wihtwaran fulwiht ærest manna.
Her sunne aþystrode, and Arcenbriht Cantwara cyng forðferde, and Colman mid his geferum for to his cyððe.
And þy ilcan geare wæs micel manncwealm, and Ceadda and Wilferð wæron gehadode, and þy ilcan geare <Deusdedit> forðferde.
Her <Theodorius> man hadode to ærcebisceope.
Her Ecgbriht cing sealde Basse mæssepreoste Raculf menster on to tymbrianne.
Her forðferde Osweo Norþanhymbra cyng, and Ecgferð rixode æfter him.
And Hloþhere feng to bisceopdome ofer Wessexna, ægelbrihtes bisceopes nefa, and heoldviigear, and Theodor bisceop hine gehalgode.
And se Osweo wæs æþelferðing, æþelferð æþelricing, æþelric Iding, Ida Eopping.
Her wæs þæt micle fugla wæl.
Her forðferde Cenwealh, and Seaxburhiger ricsode, his cwen, æfter him.
Her Ecgbriht Cantwara cyng forðferde, and þy ilcan geare wæs sinoð æt Heortforda, and Sancte æþelbriht ongann þæt menster æt Elige.
Her feng æscwine to rice on Westseaxum, se wæs Cenfusing, Cenfus Cenferðing, <Cenferð> Cuþgilsing, <Cuþgils> Ceolwulfing, Ceolwulf Cynricing, Cynric Cerdicing.
Her Wulfhere Pending and æscwine gefuhton æt Biedanheafde, and þy ilcan geare forðferde Wulfhere, and æþelred feng to rice.
Her æscwine forðferde, and Hædde feng to bisceopdome, and Centwine feng to rice, and se Centwine wæs Cynegylsing, Cynegyls Ceolulfing, and æþelred Myrcna cyng oferhergode Centland.
Her oðywde cometa se steorra, and Wilferð bisceop wæs adrifen of his bisceopdome fram Ecgferðe cynge.
Her ælfwine wæs ofslegen, and Sancte æþeldrið forðferde.
Her gesæt <Theodorius> arcebisceop sinoð on Hæðfelda forþon he wolde þone Cristes geleafan gerihtan, and þy ilcan geare forðferde Hild abbudesse.
On þysum geare Centwine geflimde Bryttwealas oþ sæ.

Her Ceadwalla ongan æfter rice winnan, se Ceadwalla wæs Cenbrihting, Cenbriht Ceadding, Ceadda Cuþing, Cuþa Ceaulining, Ceawlin Cynricing, Cynric Cerdicing, and Mul wæs Ceadweallan broþor, þone eft man on Cent forbærnde.
And þy ilcan geare Ecgferð king man ofsloh, se Ecgferð wæs Osweoing, Osweo æþelferþing, æþelferð æþelricing, æþelric Iding, Ida Eopping.
And Hloðhere þy ilcan geare forðferde.
Her Ceadwealla and Mul Cent and Wiht forhergodon.
Her Mul wearð on Cent forbærned and oþrexiimen mid him and þy gere Ceadwealla eft Cent forhergode.
Her Ine feng to Wessexnarice and heoldxxxviiwintra.
And þy ilcan geare Ceadwealla for to Rome and fulwiht onfeng fram þam papan, and se papa hine het Petrus, and ymbviiniht he ferde forð.
Þonne wæs se Ine Cenreding, Cenred Ceolwalding, Ceolwald wæs Cynegylses broþor, and þa wæron Cuðwines suna <Ceaulininges>, Ceaulin Cynricing, Cynric Cerdicing.
Her Theodorus ærcebisceop forðferde, and feng Brihtwold to þam bisceopdome.
Ær wæron romanisce bisceopos, syþþan wæron englisce.
Her Cantware geþyngedon wið Ine and him gesealdonxxx<þusenda> punda forþon þe hi ær Mul forbærndon.
And Wihtred feng to Cantwararice and heoldxxxiiiwintra, se Wyhtred wæs Ecgbrihting, Ecgbriht Ercanbrihting, Earcanbriht Eadbalding, Eadbald Eþelbrihting.
Her Hædde bisceop forðferde, and he heold þone bisceopdomxxxviiwintra on Wintanceastre.
Her æþelred Pending Myrcna cyng onfeng munuchade and þæt rice heoldxxixwintra.
Þa feng Cenred to.
Her Ealdferð Norþanhymbra cing forðferde, and Seaxulf bisceop.
Her Ealdhelm forðferde, se wæs be westan wuda bisceop.
And wæs todæled on foreweardum Danieles dagum on twa bisceopscira Wessexnaland, and ær hit wæs i.
Oþer heold Daniel, oþer heold Ealdhelm, æfter Ealdhelme feng Forðhere to.
And Ceolred feng to Myrcnarice, and Cenred for to Rome and Offa mid him.
Her Beorhtfrið ealdormann feaht wið Peohtas, and Ine and Nunna <fuhton> wið Gerente þam cinge.
Her forðferde Guþlac se halga.
Her Ine and Ceolred gefuhton æt Woddesbeorge.
Her Osred Norþanhymbra cing wearþ ofslegen, se hæfdeviiwinter rice æfter Ealdferþe, þa feng Cenred to rice and heoldiigear, þa Osric and heoldxigear.
And on þam geare Ceolwold Myrcna cing forðferde, and his lic restat on Licetfelda, and æþelredes Pendinges on Beardanigge.
And þa feng æþelbald to rice on Myrcum and heoldxliwintra, æþelbald wæs Alweoing, Alweo Eawing, Eawa Pypping, þæs cynn ys beforan.
And Ecgbriht, se arwyrða wer, on Hii þam ealande þa munucas on riht gecyrde þæt hi Eastron on riht heoldon and þa cyrclican sceare.

Her Inegild Ines broþor forðferde, and hira sweostor wæron Cwenburh and Cuðburh, and seo Cuðburh þæt lif æt Winburnan arærde, and heo wæs forgifen Ealdferþe Norþanhymbra cynge, and hi be him lyfiendum hi gedældon.
Her Daniel ferde to Rome, and þy ilcan geare Ine ofsloh Cenewulf.
Her towearp æþelburh cwen Tantun, <þe> Ine ær timbrede.
And Ealdbriht wreccea gewat on Suþrige and on Suðsexe.
And Ine gefeaht wið Suþsexum.
Her Wihtred Cantwara cing forðferde.
Her Ine for to Rome, and feng æþelheard to Wessexnarice and heoldxiiiigear.
And þy ilcan geare gefuhton æþelheard and Oswald se æþeling, and Oswald wæs æþelbalding, æþelbald Cynebalding, Cynebald Cuþwining, Cuðwine Ceaulining.
Her cometa se steorra hine oðywde, and Sancte Ecgbriht forðferde.

Her wæs Osric ofslegen Norðhymbra cyning, and feng Ceolwulf to þam rice and <heold>viiiger, and se Ceolwulf wæs Cuþing, Cuþa Cuðwining, Cuðwine Leodwalding, Leodwald Ecgwalding, Ecgwald Ealdhelming, Ealdhelm Ocing, Ocea Iding, Ida Eopping.
And Brihtwald arcebisceop gefor, and þy ilcan geare wæs Tatwine gehalgod to ærcebisceope.
Her æþelbald geeode Sumortun, and sunne aþystrode.
Her wæs se mona swilce he wære mid blode begoten, and ferdan forð Tatwine and Beda.
Her Noþhelm ærcebisceop onfeng pallium fram Romana bisceope.
Her Forðhere bisceop and Friþogyð cwen ferdon to Rome.
Her Eadbriht Eating, Eata Leodwalding, feng to Norðhymbrarice and heoldxxigeara, and his broþor wæs Ecgbriht Eating, ærcebisceop, and hi restat begen on Eoferwicceastre on anum portice.
Her æþelheard cyng ferde forð, and feng Cuþred to Wessexnarice and heoldxxviwintra, and heardlice he gewann wið æþelbald cing.
And Cuðbriht wæs to ærcebisceope gehalgod and Dun bisceop to Hrofesceastre.
Her æþelbald and Cuðred <fuhton> wið Wealas.
Her Daniel gesæt on Wintanceastre, and Hunferð feng to bisceopdome.
Her Daniel forðferde, þa wæsxliiiwintra agan siððan he onfeng bisceopdome.
Her man sloh Selred cing.
Her wæs ofslegen Cynric Wessexna æþeling, and Eadbriht Cantwara cing forðferde.
Her Cuðred cing feaht wið æþelhun þone ofermedan ealdormann.
Her Cuþred gefeaht þyxiigere his rices æt Beorhforda wið æþelbald.
Her Cuðred feaht wið Wealas.
Her Cuðred forðferde and Cyneheard feng to bisceopdome æfter Hunferðe on Wintanceastre, and Cantwaraburh forbarn þy gere, and Sigebriht feng to Wessexnarice and heold an gear.
Her Cynewulf benam Sigebrihte his rices and Wessexna witan for unrihtum dædum butan Hamtunscire, and he hæfde þa oð he ofsloh þone ealdormann þe him lengest mid wunude.
And hine þa Cynewulf of Andred adræfde, and he þær wunode oþ <þæt> hine an swan ofstang æt Pryfetesflodan, and he wræc þone ealdormann Cumbran.
And Cynewulf oft mid miclum gefeohtum feaht wið Britwealum.
And ymbxxxiwintra þæs þe he rice hæfde, he wolde adræfan anne æþeling, se wæs Cyneheard haten and he wæs Sigebrihtes broþor.
And þa geahsode he þone cyng lytle werode on wifcyððe on Merantune, and hyne þær berad, and þa burh utan beeodan ær hine þa menn onfundon þe mid þam cinge wæron.
And þa onget se cing þæt, and he on þa duru uteode and þa unheanlice hine werede oþ he on þone æþeling locode, and hi ealle þa on þone cing feohtende wæron oþ þæt hi hine ofslegenne hæfdon.

And þa on ðæs wifes gebærum onfundon þæs cinges þegnas ða unstilnesse and þæder urnon swa hwilc swa þonne gearo wearð, and him þa se æþeling æghwilcum feoh and feorh bead, and hira nænig þicgan nolde, ac hi simle feohtende wæron oþ hi ealle lagon buton anum Bryttiscan gisle, and se wæs forwundod.

Þa on mergen gehyrdon þæt þæs cinges þegnas þe beæftan him wæron þæt se cing wæs ofslegen, þa ridon hi þæder and his ealdorman Osric and Wigferð his þegn and þa menn þe he ær beæftan læfde, and þone æþeling on þære byrig gemettun þær se cing ofslegen læg, and hi him þa gatu to belocen hæfdon, and hi þærto eodon.

And þa bead he him hyra agenne dom feos and landes gif hi him þæs rices uþon, and him cyðdon þæt hira magas him mid wæron þa þe him fram noldon, and þa cwædon hi þæt him nænig mæg leofra nære ðonne hira hlaford and hi næfre his banan folgian noldon.
And þa budon hi hyra magum þæt hi him gesunde fram eodon, and hie cwædon þæt þæt ilce hiera geferum geboden wære þe ær mid þam cinge wæron.
Þa cwædon hi þæt hie þæs ne amundon þe ma þe eowre geferan þe mid þam cinge ofslegene wæron.

And hie þa ymb þa gatu feohtende wæron oþ <þæt> hie þærinne fulgon and þone æþeling ofslogon and þa menn þe mid him wæron, ealle buton anum, þæs duxes godsunu, and he his feorh generode, and þeah he wæs oft gewundod.
Se Cynewulf rixodexxxigeara, and his lic lið on Wintanceastre, and þæs æþelinges æt Axanmenster, and heora rihtfæderencynn gæð to Cerdice.

And þy ilcan geare man ofsloh æþelbald Myrcna cing on Seccandune, and his lic lið on Hreopandune, and Beornred feng to rice and hit lytle hwyle heold and ungefealice, and þy ilcan geare feng þa Offa to rice and heoldxxxixwintra, and Ecgferð his sunuxlidaga andcdaga, se Offa wæs þingferþing, þingferð Eanwulfing, Eanwulf Osmoding, Osmod Eawing, Eawa Pybbing, Pybba Creoding, Creoda Cynewalding, Cynewald Cnebbing, Cnebba Iceling, Icel Eomæring, Eomær Angelþeowing, Angelþeow Offing, Offa Wærmunding, Wærmund Wihtlæging, Wihtlæg Wodening.
Her Cuðbriht ærcebisceop forðferde.
Her Bregowine wæs to ærcebisceope gehadod to Sancte Mihaheles tide.
Her æþelbriht Cantwara cing forðferde.
Her wæs se micla winter.
Her Eadbriht wæs gehadod to ærcebisceope on þonexldæg ofer midne winter.
Her Eadbriht ærcebisceop onfeng pallium.
Her Mildred bisceop forðferde.
Her oðywde read <Cristes> mæl on heofenum æfter sunnan setlgange, and þy geare gefuhtun Myrce and Cantware æt Ottanforda, and wundorlice nædran wæron gesewene on Suðsexenalande.
Her Cynewulf and Offa gefuhton ymb Benesingtun, and Offa genam þone tun.
Her Ealdsexe and Francan gefuhton.

Her Cyneheard ofsloh Cynewulf cing, and he þær wearð ofslegen andlxxxiiiimanna mid him, and þa onfeng Beorhtric Wessexnarices, and he rixodexviwinter, and his lic lið æt Werham, and his rihtfæderencynn gæð to Cerdice.
Her wæs geflit and fullic sinoð æt Cealchyþe, and Eanbriht ærcebisceop forlet sumne dæl his bisceopdomes, and fram Offan cinge Higebriht wæs gecoren, and Ecgferð to cinge gehalgod.

Her nam Brihtric cing Offan dohtor Eadburge, and on his dagum comon ærestiiiscipu Norðmanna, and þa se gerefa þærto rad and hie wolde drifan to þæs cinges tune, þy he nyste hwæt hie wæron, and hine man ofsloh.
Þæt wæron þa ærestan scypu Deniscra manna þe Angelcynnes land gesohton.
Her Eadbriht ærcebisceop forðferde, and þy ilcan geare wæs gecoren æþelheard abbud to ærcebisceope.
Her Offa Myrcna cing het æþelbrihte þæt heafod ofaslean.

Her Adrianus papa and Offa cing forðferdon, and æþelred Norðhymbra cing wæs ofslegen fram his agenre þeode, and Ceolulf bisceop and Eadbald bisceop of þam lande aforan, and Ecgferð feng to Myrcnarice and þy ilcan geare forðferde, and Eadbriht onfeng rice on Cent, þam wæs oðer nama nemned Prænn.
Her Cynulf Myrcna cing oferhergode Cantware and Mercware, and gefengon Prænn hyra cing and gebundenne hine on Merce læddon.

Her Romane Leone þam papan his tungon forcurfon and his eagan ut astungon and hine of his setle aflymdon, and þa sona eft Gode fultumiendum he mihte geseon and sprecan, and eft wæs papa swa he ær wæs.
Her æþelheard arcebisceop and Cynebriht Wessexna bisceop foron to Rome.
Her Brihtric cing forðferde, and Worr ealdormann, and Ecgbriht feng to Wessexnarice.

And þy ilcan dæge rad æþelmund ealdormann of Hwiccum ofer æt Cynemæresforda, þa gemetten hine Weohstan ealdormann mid Wilsætum, þær wearð micel gefeoht and hi þær begen ofslegene wæron þa ealdormenn, and Wilsæte naman sige.
Her wæs gehadod Beornmod bisceop to Hrofeceastre.
Her æþelheard arcebisceop forðferde, and Wulfred wæs to arcebisceope gehalgod, and Forðred abbud forðferde.
Her Wulfred arcebisceop pallium onfeng.
Her Cuðred cing forðferde on Cantwarum, and Ceolburh <abbudesse>, and Heabriht ealdormann.
Her Carl cing forðferde, and he rixodexlvwintra.
And Wulfred arcebisceop and Wigbryht Wessexena bisceop foron begen to Rome.
Her Wulfred arcebisceop mid bletsunge þæs papan Leon hwearf eft to his agnum bisceopdome.
And þy gere gehergode Ecgbriht cing on Westwealas fram easteweardum oþ westewearde.
Her Leo se æþela papa and se halga forðferde, and æfter him <Stephanus> feng to rice.
Her Stephanus papa forðferde, and æfter him wæs Paschalis to papan gehalgod.
And þy ilcan geare forbarn Angelcynnes scole.
Her Cenulf Myrcna cing forðferde, and Ceolwulf feng to rice, and Eadbriht ealdormann forðferde.
Her Ceolwulf wearð his rices bescyred.
Heriiealdormenn wurdon ofslegene, Burhelm and Muca and sinoð wæs æt Cleofeshoo.
Her wæs Weala gefeoht and Defna æt Gafulford.
And þy ilcan geare gefeaht Ecgbriht and Beornulf Myrcna cing æt Ellendune, and Ecgbriht sige nam, and þær wæs micel wæl ofslegen.

Þa sende <he> Aþulf his sunu of þære fyrde and Ealhstan his bisceop and Wulfheard his ealdormann to Cent micle werede, and hie Baldred þone cing norð ofer Temese adrifon and Cantware him to cierdon, and Suþrige and Suðsexe and Eastsexe, þy hie fram his magum ær mid unrihte anydde wæron.
And þy ilcan geare Eastengla cing and seo þeod gesohton Ecgbryht cing him to friþe and to mundboran for Myrcna ege, and þy ilcan geare slogon Eastengle Beornulf Myrcna cing.
Her Ludecan Myrcna cing and his fif ealdormenn mid him man ofsloh, and Wiglaf feng to rice.
Her mona aþystrode on middes wintres mæsseniht.
And þy geare geeode Ecgbriht cing Myrcnarice and eall þæt be suþan Humbre wæs, and he wæs eahtaþa cing se ðe Bretenanwealda wæs.

And ærest wæs ælle <Suðsexna> cing se þus micel rice hæfde, se æftra wæs Ceaulin Wessexena cing, se þridda wæs æþelbriht Cantwara cing, se feorða wæs Rædwald Eastengla cing, fifta wæs Eadwine Norðhymbra cing, syxta wæs Oswald se æfter him rixode, seofoþa wæs Osweo, Oswaldes broðor, eahtoþe Ecgbriht Wessexena cing.
And se Ecgbriht lædde firde to Dore wið Norðanhymbre, and hie þær eaðmedo budon and geþwærnesse, and hie on þam tohwurfon.
Her eft Wiglaf onfeng Myrcnarice, and Aþelwold bisceop forðferde.
And þa ilcan geare lædde Ecgbriht cing fyrde on Norðwealas, and he hi ealle him to eaðmodre hyrsumnesse gedyde.
Her Wulfred arcebisceop forðferde.
Her Ceolnoþ wæs gecoren to bisceope and gehadod, and Felogild abbud forðferde.
Her Ceolnoð arcebisceop onfeng pallium.
Her hæþene menn oferhergodan Scepigge.
Her feaht Ecgbriht cing wiðxxxvscyplæsta æt Carrum, and þær wearð micel wæl geslegen, and þa Deniscan ahton wælstowe geweald.
And Hereferð and Wigþen,iibisceopes, forðferdon, and Duda and Osmod,iiealdormenn, forðferdon.
Her com micel scyphere on Westwealas, and hi to anum gecyrdon and wið Ecgbriht Wessexena cing winnende wæron.
Þa he þæt gehyrde, he þa mid firde ferde and him wið gefeaht æt Hengestesdune, and ægþer geflimde ge þa Wealas ge þa <Deniscan>.

Her Ecgbriht cing forðferde, and hyne hæfde ær Offa Mircna cing and Brihtric Wessexena cing aflymediiigear of Angelcynnes lande on Francland ær he cing wære, and þy fultomode Brihtric Offan þy he hæfde his dohtor him to cwene.
And se Ecgbriht ricsodexxxviiwintra and vii monoð, and feng þa Aþelwulf Ecgbrihting to Wessexenarice, and he sealde æþestane his suna Cantwararice and Eastsexenarice and Suðrigea and Suðseaxena.
Her Wulfheard ealdormann gefeaht æt Hamtune wiðxxxiiiiscyphlæsta and þær micel wæl gesloh and sige nam, and þy geare forðferde Wulfheard.
And þy ilcan geare gefeaht æþelhelm ealdorman wið Deniscne here on Port mid Dorsætun and gode hwile þone here geflymde, and þa <Deniscan> ahton wælstowe geweald and þone ealdormann ofslogan.
Her Herebriht ealdormann wæs ofslegen fram hæþenum mannum and mænige menn mid him on Merscwarum, and þy ilcan gere eft on Lindesie and on Eastenglum and on Cantwarum wurdon ofslegene fram þam herige.
Her wæs micel wælsliht on Lundene and on Cantwarabirig and on Hrofesceastre.
Her æþelwulf cing gefeaht æt Carrum wiðxxxvscyphlæsta, and þa Deniscan ahton wælstowe geweald.
Her gefeaht Eanulf ealdormann mid Sumorsætum and Eahlstan bisceop and Osric ealdormann mid Dorsætum <gefuhton> æt Pedredan muþan wið Deniscne here, and þær micel wæl geslogon and sige namon.
Her Ceorl ealdormann gefeaht wið hæþene here mid Defnascire æt Wicganbeorhge, and þær micel wæl geslogon and sige namon.
And hæþene menn ærest on Tenet ofer winter sæton.

And þy ilcan geare comon feorðe healf hund scipa on Temese muþan, and bræcon Cantwaraburh and Lundenburh, and geflymdon Beorhtwulf Myrcna cing mid his fyrde, and foron suð ofer Temese on Suþrige, and him gefeaht wið Aþulf cing and Aþelbald his sunu æt Aclea mid Wessexena firde, and þær þæt mæste wæl geslogon þe we secgan hyrdon oð þysne andweardan dæg, and þar sige namon.
And þy ilcan geare Æþestan cing and Ealhere ealdormann <gefuhton> on scypun, and <micelne> here ofslogon æt Sandwic on Cent andviiiscipu gefengon and þa oðre geflymdon.
Her bæd Burhred Myrcna cing and his witan Aþelwulf cing þæt he him gefultomode þæt he him Norðwealas gehyrsumude.
He þa swa dide and mid fyrde for ofer Myrce on Norðwealas, and he him ealle gehyrsume gedyde.
And þy ilcan geare sende Aþelwulf cing ælfred his sunu to Rome, þa wæs domne Leo papa on Rome, and he hyne to cinge gehalgode and hine him to bisceopsuna genam.

Þa þy ilcan geare Ealhhere mid Cantwarum and Huda mid Suþrigium gefuhton on Tenet wið hæþenum here and ærest sige namon, and þær wearð mæni mon ofslegen and adruncen on gehwæþere hand, and þa ealdormenn begen deade.
And þæs ofer Eastron geaf Aþelwulf cing his dohtor Burhrede cinge of Wessexum on Myrce.
Her hæþene menn ærest in Sceapigge ofer winter sætun.

And þy ilcan geare gebocode Aþelwulf cing teoþan dæl his landes ofer eall his rice Gode to lofe and him syluum to ecre hælo, and þy ilcan gere ferde to Rome mid micelre weorðnesse, and þæs wæsxiimonað wuniende, and þa him hamweard for, and him þa Carl Francena cing his dohtor geaf him to cwene, and æfter þam to his leodum com, and hie þæs fegne wæron, and ymbiigear þæs þe he of Francum com, he gefor, and his lic lið on Wintanceastre, and he rixodexixhealf gear.

And se Aþelwulf wæs Ecgbrihting, Ecgbriht Ealhmunding, Ealhmund Eafing, Eofa Eopping, Eoppa Ingelding, Ingeld wæs Ines broþor Wessexena cinges, and he heold þæt ricexxxviiwintra and eft ferde to Sancte Petre and þær his feorh gesealde.

And hi wæron Cenredes sunu, Cenred wæs Ceolwalding, Ceolwald Cuðing, Cuþa Cuðwining, Cuðwine Ceaulining, Ceaulin Cynricing, Cynric Creoding, Creoda Cerdicing, Cerdic wæs Elesing, Elesa Esling, Esla Gewising, Gewis Wigging, Wig Freawining, Freawine Freoþogaring, Freoþogar Branding, Brand Bældæging, Bældæg Wodening, Woden Frealafing, Frealaf Finning, Finn Godulfing, Godulf Geatting, Geatt Tætwaing, Tætwa Beawing, Beaw Scealdwaing, Scealdwa Heremoding, Heremod Itermoning, Itermon Haðraing, Haþra Hwalaing, Hwala Bedwiging, Bedwig Sceafing.
Id est filius Noe, se wæs geboren on þære earce Noes, Lamech, Matusalem, Enoh, Iared, Malalehel, Camon, Enos, Seth, Adamprimus homo et pater noster id est Cristus.
Ond þa fengon Aþelwulfes sunuiito rice, Aþelbald to Wessexenarice and æþelbriht to Cantwararice and to Suðrigea and to Suðsexenarice, and þa ricsode Aþelbaldvgear.
Her Aþelbald cing forðferde, and his lic lið æt Scireburnan, and þa feng æþelbriht to eallum þam rice his broþor, and he hit heold on godre geþwærnesse.

And on his dæge com micel scyphere upp and abræcon Wintanceaster, and wið þone here gefuhton Wulfheard ealdormann mid Hamtunscire and Aþelwulf ealdormann mid Bearrucscire, and hi ðone here geflymdon and wælstowe geweald ahton.
And se æðelbriht ricsodevgear, and his lic lið æt Scireburnan.

Her sæt hæþen here on Tenet and genam frið wið Cantwarum, and Cantware him feoh geheton wið þam friðe, and under þam friðe and þam feohgehate se here hyne on nyht upp bestæl and oferhergode ealle Cænt eastewearde.
Her æþered æðelbrihtes broþor feng to Wessexenarice.
And þy ilcan gere com micel hæþen here on Angelcynnes land and wintersetl namon on Eastenglum, and ðær gehorsode wurdon, and hie him frið wið namon.

Her for se here of Eastenglum ofer Humbre muþan to Eoferwicceastre on Norðanhymbre, and þær wæs micel ungeðwærnes þære ðeode betwuh him selfum, and hi hæfdon hyra cing aworpenne Osbriht and ungecyndne cing underfengon ællan.

And hi late on gere to þan gecyrdon þæt hi wið þone here wæron winnende, and hi ðeah micle fyrd gegaderedon and ðone here sohton on Eoferwic and on ða ceastre bræcon, and hi sume ðærinne wurdon, and þær wæs ungemetlic wæl geslegen Norðanhymbre, sume binnan, sume butan, and þa cingas begen ofslegene wæron, and seo laf wið þone here frið nam.
And ðy ilcan gere gefor Ealhstan bisceop, and he hæfde þæt bisceoprice æt Scireburnanlwintra, and his lic lið þær on tune.
Her for se ilca here innan Myrce to Snotengaham and þær wintersetl namon.
And Burhred Myrcna cing and his witan bædon æþered Wessexena cing and ælfred his broðor þæt hi him gefultumedon þæt hi wið þone here gefuhton.

And ða ferdan hi mid Wessexena fyrde innan Myrce oþ Snotingaham and þone here ðær gemetton on þam geweorce and hine inne besæton, and þær nan hefelic gefeoht ne wearð, and Myrce frið namon wið ðone here.
Her for se here eft to Eoforwicceastre and þær sæt an gear.
Her rad se here ofer Myrce on Eastengle and wintersetl namon æt þeodforda, and þy wintra Eadmund cing him wið feaht, and þa Deniscan sige namon and ðone cing ofslogon and þæt land geeodon eall.
And þy ilcan geare gefor Ceolnoð arcebisceop.
Her com se here to Readingum on Wessexe, and ðæs eft ymbiiiniht ridoniieorlas upp.
Ða gemette Aþelwulf ealdormann hie on Englafelda, and him þær wið gefeaht and sige nam, and hyra ðær wearð oþer ofslegen þæs nama wæs Sidroc.

Ðam ymbiiiiniht æþered cing and ælfred his broþor ðær micle fyrd to Readingum gelæddon and wið þone here gefuhton, and þær wæs micel wæl geslegen on gehwæþere hand, and Aðelwulf ealdormann wearð ofslegen, and þa Deniscan ahton wælstowe geweald.

And þæs ymbiiiiniht gefeaht Æþered cing and Ælfred his broþor wið ealne þone here on Æscesdune, and hi wæron on twam gefylcum, on oþrum wæs Bagsecg and Healfdene, þa hæðenan cingas, and on oðrum wæron þa eorlas.

And ða feaht se cing æþered wið þara cinga getruman, and þær wearð se cing Bagsecg ofslegen, and ælfred his broðor feaht wið þara eorla getruman, and þær wearð Sidroc eorl ofslegen se ealda and Sidroc se geongra and Osbearn eorl and Fræna eorl and Harold eorl, and þa hergeas begen geflymde, and fela þusenda ofslegenra, and on feohtende wæron oþ niht.
And ðæs ymbexiiiiniht gefeaht æþered cing and ælfred his broðor wið þone here æt Basingun, and þær þa Deniscan sige namon.

And ðæs ymbeiimonþas gefeaht æþered cing and ælfred his broþor wið þone here æt Meretune, and hie wæron on twam gefylcum, and hie butu geflymdon and lange on dæg sige ahton, and þær wearð micel wælsliht on <gehwæþre> hand, and þa Deniscan ahton wælstowe geweald, and þær wearð Heahmund bisceop ofslegen and fela godra manna.
And æfter þyssum gefeohte com micel sumerlida to Readingum.
And þæs ofer Eastron gefor æþered cing, and he ricsodevger, and his lic lið æt Scireburnan menster.
Ða feng ælfred æþelwulfing his broþor to Wessexenarice.
And ðæs ymbe anne monað gefeaht ælfred cing wið ealne þone here lytle werede æt Wiltune and hine lange on dæg geflymde, and þa Deniscan ahton wælstowe geweald.

And þæs geares wurdonixfolcgefeoht gefohten wið þone here on þy cynerice be suðan Temese butan þam þe him ælfred þæs cinges broþor and ealdormenn and cinges þegnas oft rada on ridon, þe mon na ne rimde, and þæs geares wæron ofslegeneixeorlas andicing, and þy geare namon Wessexan frið wið þone here.
Her for se here to Lundenbyrig fram Readingum and ðar nam wintersetl, and þa namon Myrce frið wið þone here.
Her for se here on Norðhymbre, and he nam wintersetl on Lindesse æt Turesigge, and þa naman Myrce frið wið þone here.
Her for se here of Lindesse to Hreopedune and þær wintersetl nam and ðone cing Burhred ofer sæ adræfdon ymbe twa and<xxii>wintra þæs ðe he rice hæfde, and þæt land eall geeodon.
And he for to Rome and þær gesæt, and his lic lið on Sancta Marian circan on Angelcynnes scole.

And þy ilcan gere hie sealdon Ceolwulfe, anum unwisum cinges ðegne, Myrcnarice to healdenne, and he him aþas swor and gislas sealde þæt hit him gearo wære swilce dæge swa hie hit habban woldon, and he gearo wære mid him selfum and mid eallum ðam þe him gelæstan woldon to þæs heres ðearfe.

Her for se here fram Hreopedune, and Healfdene for mid sumum þam here on Norðhymbre and nam wintersetl be <Tinan> þære ea, and se here þæt land geeode and oft hergode on Peohtas and on Strecled Wealas, and for Godrum and Oscytel and Anwend, þaiiicingas, of <Hreopedune> to Grantebricge mid micle here and sæton þær an gear.
And þy sumera for ælfred cing ut on sæ mid scyphere and gefeaht wiðviiscyphlæstas and hyra an gefeng and þa oðre geflymde.
Her hine bestæl se here into Werham Wessexena fyrde.

And siððan wið þone here se cing nam frið, and him þa gislas sealdon þe on ðam here weorðoste wæron to þam cinge and him þa aðas sworan on þam halgan beage, þe hi ær noldon nanre þeode, þæt hi hrædlice of his rice faran woldon, and hi þa under þam hi nihtes bestælon ðære fyrde se gehorsoda here inn to Exanceastre.
And þy geare Healfdene Norðanhymbraland gedælde, and ergende wæron and hira tilgende wæron.
Her com se here to Exancestre fram Werham, and ða mette hie micel myst on sæ and þær forwearðcxxscypa æt Swanewic.

And se cing ælfred æfter þam gehorsodan here mid fyrde rad oþ Exancester, and hi hindan ofridan ne mihte, and hi him gislas sealdon, swa fela swa he habban wolde, and micle aþas sworon, and ða godne frið heoldon.
And þa on hærfeste gefor se here on Myrcnaland and hit gedældon sum and sum Ceolwulfe sealdon.

Her hine bestæl se here on midne winter oferxiiniht to Cyppanhamme, and geridon Wessexnaland and þar gesæton, and micel ðæs folces ofer sæ adræfdon, and þæs oþres þone mæstan dæl hi geridon, and þæt folc hym to gebigde buton þam cinge ælfrede.
He lytle werede uneþelice æfter wudum for and on morfæstenum.

And þæs ilcan wintres wæs Inweres broðor and <Healfdenes> on Wessexenarice midxxiiiscypa, and hine mon þær ofsloh anddcccmanna mid him andlx<heafodmanna> his heres, and ðær wæs se guðfana genumen þe hie Hræfn heton.
Ond þæs on Eastron worhte ælfred cing lytle werede geweorc æt æþelingaigge, and of ðam geweorce wæs winnende wið þone here, and Sumursætena se dæl se ðærnehst wæs.

Þa on þæreviiwucan ofer Eastron he gerad to Ecgbrihtesstane be eastan Sealwuda, and him comon þær ongen Sumursæte ealle, and Wilsæte and Hamtunscir se dæl þe hire beheonan sæ wæs, and his gefægne wæron.

And he for þæs embe ane niht of þam wicum to Iglea and ðæs eft embe ane niht to Eðandune, and þær gefeaht wið ealne þone here and hine geflymde and him æfter rad oþ þæt geweorc and ðær sætxiiiiniht, and ða sealde se here him foregislas and micle aþas þæt hie of his rice woldon, and him eac geheton þæt hyra cing fulwihte onfon wolde, and hie þæt gelæston.

And ðæs embeiiiwucan com se cing Godrum þritega sum þara manna ðe on þam here weorþoste wæron æt Alre, þæt ys wið æþelingaigge, and his se cing ðær onfeng æt fulwihte, and hys crysumlysing wæs æt Wedmor, and he wæsxiiniht mid þam cinge, and he hine miclum and his geferan mid feo weorþode.
Her for se here to Cyrenceastre of Cyppanhamme and sæt þær an winter.
And ðy ilcan gere gegadrodon an hloð wicinga and gesæt æt Fullanhamme be Temese.
And þy ilcan gere aþystrode seo sunne ane tid dæges.
Her for se here of Cyrenceastre on Eastengle and gesæt þæt land and gedælde.
And þy ilcan gere for se here ofer sæ þe ær on Fullanhamme sæt on Francland to Gænt and sæt þær an ger.
Her for se here ufur on Francland, and þa Francan him wið gefuhton, and þær wearð se here gehorsod æfter þam gefeohte.
Her for se here upp andlang Mæse ufur on Francland and þæt sæt an gear.

And þy ilcan gere for ælfred cing mid scypum ut on sæ and gefeaht wiðiiiiscyphlæstas Deniscra manna, and þara scypa tuw genam and ða menn ofslegene wurdon þe ðæron wæron, andiiscyphlæstas him on hand heodon, and ða wæron miclum ofslegene and forwundode ær hi on hand eodon.
Her for se here upp on Scald to <Cundað> and þær sæt an ger.

And Marinus papa sende þalignum dominiælfrede cinge, and þy ilcan gere lædde Sihelm and æþestan þa ælmessan to Rome and eac on <Indea> to Sancte Thome and to Sancte Bartholomeae, þa hi sæton wið þone here æt Lundenne and hie þær Godes þances swiðe bentiþe wurdon æfter þam gehate.
Her for se here upp on Sunnan to Embenum and ðær sæt an ger.

Her todælde se foresprecena here on tuw, oðer dæl to Hrofesceastre and ymbsæton þa cester and worhton oþer fæsten embe hie selfe, and hie ðeah þa ceaster aweredon oþ þæt ælfred cing com utan mid fyrde.
Þa eode se here to hyra scipum and forleton þæt geweorc, and hi wurdon þær behorsode, and <sona> ðy ilcan sumera eft ofer sæ <gewitun>.
Þy ilcan gere sende ælfred cing sciphere of Cent on Eastengle.
Sona swa hi comon on <Sture> muþan, ða gemetten hiexviscipu wicinga and wið þa gefuhton and ða scipu ealle geræhton and ða menn ofslogon.
Ða hie hamweard wendon mid þare herehyðe, þa metton hie micelne scyphere wicinga and þa wið þa gefuhton þy ilcan dæge, and ða Deniscan ahton sige.
Ðy ilcan gere ær middan wintra forðferde Carl Francna cing, and hine ofsloh an efor.
And ane gere ær his broðor forðferde, se hæfde eac þæt Westrice, ða wæron Hloðwiges sunu begen.
Se forðferde þy ilcan gere þe seo sunne aðystrode, se wæs ðæs Carles sunu þe æðelwulf Wessexena cing hys dohtor hæfde him to cwene.
Þy ilcan gere gegaderode micel scyphere on Ealdseaxum, and þær wearð micel gefeoht, tuwa on gere, and þa Seaxan hæfdon sige, and ðær wæron Frysan mid.

Þy ilcan gere feng Carl to ðam Westrice and to eallum ðam rice þe beheonan Wendel sæ and begeondan þisse sæ, swa hit his ðridda fæder hæfde, butan Lidwicingum, se Carl wæs Hloðwiges sunu, se Hloþwig wæs Carles broðor, se was Iudettan fæder þe æðelwulf cing hæfde, and hi wæron Hloðwiges <suna>.
Se Hloðwi wæs þæs ealdan Carles sunu, se Carl wæs Pippenes sunu.
Ðy ilcan gere forðferde se goda papa Marinus, se gefreode Angelcynnes scole be ælfredes bene cinges, and he sende him micle gyfa and ðære rode dæl þe Crist on ðrowode.
And þy ilcan gere se here on Eastenglum bræc frið wið ælfred cing.
Her for se here eft west þe ær east gelænde, and ða upp on Signe and þar wintersetu namon æt Paris þære birig.
Þy ilcan gere gesette ælfred cing Lundenburh, and him eall Angelcynn to cyrde, þæt butan Deniscra manna hæftnede wæs, and he þa befæste þa burh æðerede ealdormenn to healdenne.
Her for se here upp þurh ða bricge æt Paris, and þa upp andlang Signe oþ Mæterne, and ða upp on Mæterne oþ Cariei, and ða sæton þara and innan Ionan tuw winter on ðam twam stedum.

And þy ilcan gere forðferde Carl Francna cing, and Earnulf his broðorsunu hineviwucan ær he forðferde berædde æt þam rice, and ða wearð þæt rice todæled onv, andvcingas to gehalgode, þæt wæs þeah mid Earnulfes geðafunge.
And hie cwædon þæt hie þæt to his handa healdan sceoldon forþon hira nan næs on fædrenhealfe to geboren butan him anum.

Earnulf ða wunude on þam lande be eastan Rin, and Hroðulf þa feng to ðam Middelrice, and Odda to þam west dæle, and Beorngar and Wiða to Langbeardnalande and to þam landum on þa healfe muntes, and þæt heoldon mid micelre unsybbe andiifolcgefeoht gefuhton and þæt land oft and gelome forbærndon and æghwæðer oþerne oftrædlice utdræfde.
And þy ilcan gere ðe se here for forð upp ofer ða bricge æt Paris, æþelm ealdorman lædde Wessexena ælmessan and ælfredes cinges to Rome.

Her lædde Beocca ealdormann Wessexena ælmessan and ælfredes cinges to Rome, and æðelswið cwen, seo wæs ælfredes sweostor cinges, forðferde and hire lic lið æt Pauian, and þy ilcan gere æþered arcebisceop and Aþelwold ealdormann forðferdon on anum monþe.
Her on þysum geare næs nan færeld to Rome buton twegen hleaperas Ælfred cing sende mid gewritum.

Her lædde Beornhelm abbud Wessexena ælmessan to Rome and ælfredes cinges, and Godrum se norðerna cing forðferde, þæs fulluhtnama wæs æðestan, se wæs ælfredes cinges godsunu, and he bude on Eastenglum and þæt land ærest gesæt.
And þy ilcan gere for se here of Signe to Sant Loðdan, þæt is betuh Bryttum and Francum, and Bryttas him wið gefuhton and sige hæfdon, and hie bedrifon ut on ane ea and mænige adrencton.
Her for se here east, and Earnulf cing gefeaht wið þam rædehere ær þa scipu comon, mid Eastfrancum and Seaxum and Bægerum, and hine geflymde.
And ðry Scottas comon to Ælfrede cinge on anum bate butan ælcum gereðrum of Hibernia, þonon hie hie bestælon forþon þe hi woldon for Godes lufun on elþeodinesse beon, hi ne rohton hwær.

Se bat wæs geworht of þriddan healfre hyde þe hi on foron, and hi namon mid him þæt hi hæfdon toviinihtum mete, and ða comon hi embeviiniht to lande on Cornwealum and foron þa sona to Ælfrede cinge, þus hi wæron genemnede, Dubslane and Machbethu and Mælinmumin.
And Swifneh, se betsta lareow þe on Scottum wæs, gefor.

And þy ilcan geare ofer Eastron embe gandagas oþþe ær ætywde se steorra þe man on bocleden het cometa, sume menn cweþað on Englisc þæt hit si fexede steorra, forðam þær stent lang leoma of, hwilum on ane healfe, hwilum on ælce healfe.

Her on þisum geare for se micla here ðe we gefyrn ær embe spræcon eft on þam Eastrice westweard to Bunan, and þær wurdon gescypude swa þæt hi asetton hi on ænne sið ofer mid horsum mid ealle, and þa comon upp on Limene muðan midccscypa.

Se muða is on easteweardre Cent on þæs ilcan wuda east ende þe we Andred hataþ, se wudu is westlang and eastlangcxxmila lang oððe lengra andxxxmila brad, seo ea þe we ær embe spræcon lið ut of þam wealde.
On þa ea hi tugon upp hira scypu oþ þone wealdiiiimila fram ðam muþan uteweardun and þær abræcon an geweorc, inne on þam fæstene sæton feawa cyrlisce menn on, and wæs samworht.
Þa sona æfter þam com Hæsten midlxxxscypa upp Temese muþan and worhte him geweorc æt Middeltune, and se oþer here æt Apuldre.

On ðys gere, þæt wæs embexiimonað þæs ðe hi on þam Eastrice weorc geworht hæfdon, <Norþanhymbre> and Eastengle Ælfrede cinge aþas geseald hæfdon and Eastengle foregislavi, and ðeah ofer þa treowa swa þa oðre hergeas mid ealle herge ut foron, þonne foron hi mid oþþe on oðre healfe.

And þa gegadorode Ælfred cing his fyrd and for þæt he gewicode betuh þam hergum þær ðær he nehst rymet hæfde for wudufæstene and for wæterfæstene swa þæt he mihte ægðerne geræcon gif hi ænigne feld secean woldon.

Þa foran hie siððan æfter þam wealde hloðum and flocradum be swa hwæðere efes swa hit þonne fyrdleas wæs, and hi mon eac mid oþrum folcum sohte mæstra daga ælce, oþþe on dæg oððe on niht, ge of þære fyrde ge eac of þam burgum.
Hæfde se cing his fyrd on tuw tonumen swa þæt hi wæron symble healfe æt ham, healfe ute, buton þam mannum ðe þa burga heoldon.
Ne com se here oftor eall ute of ðam setum þonne tuwa, oþre siðe þa hi ærest to lande comon ær seo fyrd gesamnod wære, oðre siþe ða hi of þam gesetum faran woldon.
Þa hi gefengon micle herehyþe, and ða woldon ferian norðweardes ofer Temese innan Eastsexe ongen þa scypu.
Ða forrad seo fyrd hi foran and him wið gefeaht æt Fearnhamme and þone here geflymde, and þa herehiþe ahræddon, and hie flugon ofer Temese butan ælcum forda, þa upp be Calne on anne iggeoð.

Þa besæt seo fyrd hi þær utan þa hwile ðe hi lengest mete hæfdon, ac hi hæfdon þa hyra stemninge gesetene and hyra mete genotodne, and wæs se cing þa þæderweardnes on fære mid þære scire þe mid him selfum fyrdode.
Þa he ðæderweardnes wæs, and seo oþru fyrd wæs hamweard, and ða Deniscan sæton þær behindon, forþon hyra cing wæs gewundod on þam gefeohte þæt hi hyne ne mihton ferian.

Ða gegaderodon ða þe on Norðhymbrum bugeað and on Eastenglum sum hund scypa and foron suð ymbutan and ymbsæton an geweorc on Defnascire be þære norðsæ, and þe suðan ymbutan foron ymbsæton Exanceaster.
Þa se cing þæt hyrde, þa wende he hine west wið Exanceastres mid ealre þære fyrde butan swiðe gewealdenum dæle easteweardes þæs folces.
Þa foron forð oþ hi comon to Lundenbyrig and ða, mid þam burhwarum and mid þam fultume ðe him westan com, foran east to Beamfleote.
Wæs ða Hæsten þær cumen mid his herge þe ær æt Middeltune sæt, and eac se micla here wæs ða þærto cumen ðe ær on Limene muþan sæt æt Apuldre.
Hæfde Hæsten ær geworht þæt geweorc æt Beamfleote, and wæs þa ut afaren on hergeað, and wæs se micla here æt ham.

Þa foron hi to and geflymdon þone here and þæt geweorc abræcon and genamun eall þæt ðær binnan wæs, ge on feo ge on wifum ge eac on bearnum, and brohton eall inn to Lundenbyrig and ða scypu ealle oþþe tobræcon oððe forbærndon oþþe to Lundenbyrig brohton oððe to Hrofesceastre.

And Hæstenes wif and hisiisuna man brohte to þam cinge, and he hi eft him agef, forðan þe hyra wæs oðer his godsunu, oþer æðeredes ealdormannes, hæfdon hi hyra onfangen ær Hæsten to Beamfleote come, and he him hæfde geseald aþas and gislas, and se cing him eac wel feoh sealde and eac swa ða he ðone cniht agef and þæt wif.

Ac sona swa hi to Beamfleote comon and þæt geweorc geworht hæfdon, swa hergode he his rice þone ilcan ende þe æðered his cumpæder healdan sceolde, and eft oþre siðe he wæs on hergeoþ gelend on þæt ilce rice ða man his weorc abræc.
Þa se cing hine west wende mid þære fyrde wið Exanceastres, swa ic ær sæde, and se here ða burh beseten hæfde, þa he ðærto gefaren wæs, þa eodon hi to hyra scypum.

Ða he wið þone here ðær west abysgod wæs and ða hergeas wæron þa begen gegadrode to Sceabyrig on Eastsexum and ðær geweorc worhtan, foron þa begen ætgædre upp be Temese, and him com to micel eaca ægþer ge of Eastenglum ge of Norðhymbrum.

Þa gegadrode æþered ealdormann and æðelelm ealdormann and æþelnoð ealdormann, and þa cingas ðegnas þe ða æt ham wæron æt þam geweorcum, of ælcere byrig be eastan Pedredan, ge be westan Sealwuda, ge be eastan, ge eac be norðan Temese, and be westan Sæfern, ge eac sum dæl þæs Norðweallcynnes.
Þa hi ða gegadrode wæron ealle, ða offoron hi þone here hindon æt Buttingtune on Sæferne staðe and hine þær utan besæton on ælce healfe on anum fæstenne.

Ða hi þa ðær fela wucena sæton on twa healfa þære ea, and se cing wæs west on Defnum wið þone scyphere, ða wæron hi mid metelieste gewægde, and hæfdon þa micelne dæl þara horsa freten, and ða oþre wæron hungre acwolen.
Þa eodon hi ut to þam mannum þe on easthealfe ðære ea wicodon and him wið gefuhton, and þa cristenon hæfdon sige.
And þær wearð Ordeh cinges þegn ofslegen, and eac mænige oðre cinges þegnas, and þara Deniscra þær wearð swyþe micel geslegen, and þe dæl þe ðær onweg com wurdon on fleame generede.

Þa hi ða on Eastsexe comon to hyra geweorce and to hira scypum, þa gegadrode seo laf eft of Eastenglum and of Norðhymbrum micelne here onforan winter, and befæstan hyra wif and hyra scipu and hyra feoh on Eastenglum, and foron anstreces dæges and nihtes þæt hi gedydon on anre westre ceastre on Wirhealum seo is Liegecester gehaten.

Þa ne mihte seo fyrd hi na hindan offaran ær hi wæron inne on þam geweorce, besæton ðeah þæt geweorc sumeiidagas, and genamon ceapes eall þæt ðær butan wæs, and þa menn ofslogon þe hi foran forridan mihton buton þam geweorce, and þæt corn eall forbærndon and mid hyra horsum frettan on ælcre efennehþe.
And þæt wæs embexiimonaþ þæs ðe hi ær hider ofer sæ comon.

Ond þa sona æfter þam on ðysum geare for se here of Wirheale innan Norðwealas forðam hi þær sittan ne mihton, þæt wæs forþy ðe hi wæron benumen ægþer ge ðæs ceapes ge þæs cornes þe hi gehergod hæfdon.

Þa hi eft of Norðwealum wendon mid þære herehyþe ðe hi þær genumen hæfdon, þa foron hi ofer Norðhymbraland and on Eastengle swa swa seo fyrd hi geræcan ne mihte, oð þæt hi comon on Eastsexenaland easteweard on an igland þæt is ute on þære sæ þæt is Meresig haten.

And ða se here eft hamweard wende þe Exanceaster besetan hæfde, þa hergodon hi upp on Suðseaxum neah Cisseceastre, and þa burhware hi geflymdon and hira mænig hund ofslogon and hira scipu sume genamon.
Þa ðy ilcan geare on foreweardne winter þa Deniscan þe on Meresigge sæton tugon hyra scipu upp on Temese and þa upp on Ligenan.
Þæt wæs embe twa gear þæs ðe hi hider ofer sæ comon.
Ond þy ilcan geare worhte se foresprecena here geweorc be Ligenanxxmila bufan Lundenbyrig.
Þa ðæs on sumera foron micel dæl þara burhwara and eac swa oþres folces þæt hi gedydon æt þæra Deniscra geweorce, and þær wurdon geflymde and sumeiiiicinges þegnas ofslegene.
Þa ðæs on hærfeste wicode se cing on neaweste þære byrig þa hwile ðe hi hyra corn geripon, þæt ða Deniscan him ne mihton þæs ripes forwyrnan.
Þa sume dæge rad se cing upp be ðære ea and gehawode hwær man mihte þa ea forwyrcan þæt hi ne mihton þa scipu utbringan, and hi ða swa didon, worhton twa geweorc on twa healfe þære ea.
Þa hi þæt geweorc furþum ongunnen hæfdon, þa onget se here þæt hi ne mihton ða scipu ut bringon.
Þa forleton hi þa scypu and eodon ofer land, þæt hi gedydon æt Cwatbricge be Sæfern, and þæt geweorc worhton.
Ða rad seo ferd æfter þam herge, and þa menn of Lundenbyrig gefetedon þa scypu, and þa ealle þe hi alædan ne mihton hi tobræcon, and þa ðe þær stælweorðe wæron binnan Lundenbyrig gebrohton.
And þa Dæniscan hæfdon hyra wif befæst innan Eastengle ær hi ut of þam geweorce foron.
Þa sæton hi þone winter æt Bricge.
Þæt wæs embe þreo gear þæs ðe hi on Limene muþan hider ofer sæ comon.
Ond þæs on sumera on þysum geare tofor se here, sum on Eastengle, sum on Norðhymbre, and þa ðe feohlease wæron him þær scypu begeatun and suð ofer sæ foron to Signe.

Næfde se here, Godes þances, Angelcynnes ealles fullswiðe gebrocod, ac hi wæron micle swiðor gebrocode on þam þrim gearum mid ceapes cwylde and manna, ealra swiðost mid þam þæt monige ðara selestra cinges þegna þe ðær on lande wæron forðferdon on þam þrim gearum.

Ðara wæs sum Swiþulf bisceop on Hrofesceastre, and Ceolmund ealdormann on Cent, and Beorhtulf ealdormann on Eastsexum, and Ealhheard bisceop æt Dorceceastre, and Eadulf cinges þegn on Suðseaxum, and Beornulf wicgerefa on Wintanceastre, and Ecgulf cinges horsten, and monige toeacan him, þeah ic þa geþungenestan nemde.
Ðy ilcan gere drehton þa hergeas on Eastenglum and on Norðhymbrum Wessexenaland swiþe be þam suðstaþe mid stæl hergeum, ealra swiþost mid þam æscum þe hi fela geara ær timbredon.

Þa het ælfred cing timbrian lange scipu ongen þa æscas, þa wæron fullneah twa swa lange swa þa oðre, sume hæfdonlxara, sume ma, þa wæron ægþer ge swiftran ge unwealtran ge eac hearran þonne þa oðre, næron hi naþor ne on Frysisc gesceapen ne on Denisc, buton swa him selfum þuhte þæt hi nytweorþoste beon mihton.
Þa æt sumum cyrre þæs ilcan geres comon þærviscypu to Wiht and þær micel yfel gedydon, ægþær ge on Defenum ge welhwær be þam særiman.

Þa het se cing faran mid nigonum to þara niwra scypa, and forforon him þone muþan foran on utermere, ða foron hi mid þrim scypum ut ongean hi,iiistodon æt ufeweardum þam muþan on driggum, wæron þa menn upp on lande of agane.

Þa gefengon hi þara ðreora scypu twa æt þam muþan uteweardum, and þa menn ofslogon, and þæt an oðwand, on þam wæron eac ða menn ofslegene butanv, þa comon forþy onweg ðe þara oðerra scypu asæton, ða wurdon eac uneaþelice aseten,iiiasæton on þa healfe þæs deopes þe ða Deniscan scypu aseten wæron, and þa <oðru> ealle on oðre healfe, þæt hyra ne mihte nan to oðrum.

Ac þa þæt wæter wæs aebbod fela furlanga fram þam scypum, þa eodon þa Deniscan fram ðam oðrum þrim scypum to þam oðrum þrim þe on hyra healfe wæron beebbode, and hi þa ðær gefuhton, and þær wearð ofslegen Lucuman cinges gerefa and Wulfheard Frysa and æbbe Frysa and æþelere Frysa and æþelferð, cinges geneat, and ealra manna Frysiscra and Engliscralxii, and ðara Deniscracxx.
Þa com þam Deniscan scypum þeah ær flod to, ær þa cristenan mihton hira ut ascufan, and hi forði ut oþreowon.

Þa wæron hi to ðam gesargode þæt hi ne mihton Suðsexanaland utan berowan, ac hira þær twa sæ on land wearp, and ða menn mon lædde to Winteceaster to þam cinge, and he hi þær ahon het, and þa menn comon on Eastengle þe on ðam anum scype wæron swyðe forwundode.
Þy ilcan sumera forwearð na læs þonnexxscypa mid mannum mid ealle be ðam suðriman.
Þy ilcan geare forðferde Wulfric cinges horsþegn, se wæs Wealhgerefa.
Her on þysum geare gefor æþelm Wiltunscire ealdormann nigon nihtum ær middan sumera, and her forðferde Ealhstan, se wæs on Lundenne bisceop.

Her gefor ælfred Aþulfingvinihtum ær Ealra Halgena mæssan, se wæs cing ofer eall Angelcynn butan þam dæle þe under Dena anwealde wæs, and he heold þæt rice oþrum healfum geare læs þexxxwintra, and þa feng Eadweard his sunu to rice.
And þa gerad Aþelwold æþeling his fæderan sunu þone ham æt Winburnan, and æt Tweoxn Eam, þæs cinges unþances and his witena.

Þa rad se cing mid fyrde oð he gewicode æt Baddanbyrig wið Winburnan, and Aþelwold sæt binnan þam ham mid þam mannum þe him to gebugon, and he hæfde ealle ða gatu forworhte inn to him, and sæde þæt he wolde oþþe ðær libban oððe þær licgean.
Þa under þam þa rad se æþeling on niht aweg and gesohte þone here on Norðhymbrum, and hi hine underfengon hym to cinge and him to bugon.
Þa berad mann þæt wif þæt he hæfde ær genumen butan þæs cinges leafe and ofer þara bisceopa gebodu, forðon heo wæs ær to nunnan gehalgod.
And on þys ilcan gere forðferde æþered, wæs on Defnum ealdormann,iiiiwucan ær ælfred cing.
Her gefor Aþulf ealdormann, Ealhswiðe broþor, Eadwerdes modor cinges, and Uirgilius abbud of Scottum and Grimbold mæssepreost.
Her com Aþelwold hider ofer sæ mid eallum þam flotan þe he begitan mihte, and him to gebogen wæs on Eastsexum.

Her gelædde Aþelwold þone here on Eastenglum to unfriðe, þæt hi hergodon ofer eall Myrcnaland oþ hi comon to Creaccgelade, and foron þær ofer Temese and namon ægþer ge on Brædene ge ðær onbutan eall þæt hi gehenton meahton, and wendon þa eft hamweard.
Þa for Eadweard cing æfter, swa he raþost mihte his fyrde gegadrian, and oferhergode eall hyra land betweoh dicum and Wusan eall oþ fennas norð.
Þa he eft þanon faran wolde, þa het he beodan ofer ealle þa fyrd, þæt hi foron ealle ut ætsomne.
Þa ætsætan þa Centiscan þær beæftan ofer his bebod andviiærendracan he him hæfde to asend.

Þa befor se here hi ðær, and hi þær gefuhton, and þær wearð Sigulf ealdormann ofslegen and Sigelm ealdormann and Eadwold cinges þegn and Cenulf abbud and Sigebriht Sigulfes sunu and Eadwold Accan sunu and mænige eac to him, þeah ic þa geþungnestan nemde, and on þara Deniscra healfe wæs ofslegen Eohric cing and Aþelwold æþeling, þe hi him to cinge gecuron, and Beorhsige, Beorhtnoþes sunu æþelinges, and Ysopo hold and Oscytel hold and swiðe mænig eac mid him, þe we nu genemnan ne magon.
And ðær wæs on gehwæþere hand micel wæl geslegen, and þara Deniscra wearð ma ofslegen, þeah hi wælstowe geweald ahton.
And Ealhswið gefor þy ilcan gere.
Her on ðisum gere gefor ælfred, wæs æt Baþum gerefa.
And on þam ilcan gere man gefæstnode þone frið æt Yttingaforda, swa swa Eadweard cing gerædde, ægþer ge wið Eastengle ge wið Norðhymbre.
Her gefor Denulf se wæs on Winteceastre bisceop.
Her feng Friðestan to bisceopdome on Winteceastre, and Asser gefor æfter þam, se wæs æt Scireburnan bisceop.

And þy ilcan gere sende Eadweard cing fyrde ægþer ge of Wessexum ge of Myrcum, and heo gehergode swiðe micel on þam norð here ægþer ge on mannum ge on gehwilcum yrfe, and mænige menn ofslogon þara Deniscra, and þær wæronvwucan inne.

Her bræc se here þone frið on Norðhymbrum and forsawan ælc riht þe Eadweard cing and his witan him budon, and hergodon ofer Myrcnaland, and se cing hæfde gegadorod sum hund scypa, and wæs ða on Cent, and þa scipu foron be suþan east andlang sæ togenes him.
Þa wende se here þæt his fultumes se mæsta dæl wære on þam scypum, and þæt hi mihton unbefohtone faran þær ðær hi woldon.

Þa geahsode se cing þæt þæt hi on hergeað foron, þa sende his fyrde ægþer ge of Wessexum ge of Myrcum, and hi offoron þone here hindan, þa he hamweard wæs, and him wið gefuhton and ðone here geflymdon and his fela ðusenda ofslogon.

And þær wæs Eowils cing ofslegen and Healfden cing and Ohter eorl and Scurfa eorl and Oðulf hold and Benesing hold and Anlaf se Swearta and þurferð hold and Osferð Hlytte and Guðferð hold and Agmund hold and Guðferð.
Her gefor æþered ealdormann on Myrcum.
And Eadweard cing feng to Lundenbyrig and to Oxnaforda and to eallum þam landum þe ðærto hyrdon.
Her on þys gere embe Martines mæssan het Eadweard cing atimbran ða norðran burh æt Heortforda betweoh Meran and Beneficcean and Ligenan.

And þa æfter ðam þæs on sumera betweox gandagum and middan sumera for Eadweard cing mid sumum his fultume on Eastsexe to Mældune and wicode þær ða hwile þe man ða burh worhte and getimbrode æt Witham, and him beah god dæl þæs folces to þe ær under Deniscra manna anwealde wæron, and sum his fultum worhte þa burh þa hwile æt Heortforda on suðhealfe Ligean.
Her on geare rad se here ut ofer Eastron of Hamtune and of Ligreceastre and bræcon þone frið, and slogon mænige menn æt Hocenertune and þær onbutan.

And ða swiðe raþe æfter þam, swa ða oðre ham comon, þa fundon hi oðre folcrade þæt rad ut wið Ligtunes, and þa wurdon þa landleode his gewære and him wið gefuhton, and gebrohton hi on fullan fleame and ahreddon eall þæt hi genumen hæfdon and eac hira horsa and hira wæpna micelne dæl.

Her on þysum gere com micel scyphere hider ofer suðan of Lidwiccum, andiieorlas mid, Ohter and Hraold, and foron þa west onbutan þæt hi gedydon on Sæfern muþan and hergodon on Norðwealas æghwær be þam staðum þær hi þonne onhagode, and gefengon Camelgeac bisceop on Yrcingafelda and læddon hine mid hym to scypum, and þa alysde Eadweard cing hine midxlpundon.
Þa æfter ðam þa for se here eall up and wolde faran þa gyt on hergoð wið Yrcingafeldes.

Þa gemetton þa menn hi of Hereforda and of Gleweceastre and of ðam nehstan burgum, and him wið gefuhton and hi geflymdon, and ofslogon þone eorl Hraold and ðæs oþres eorles broþor, Ohteres, and micel þæs heres, and bedrifon hi on anne pearroc and besæton hi þær utan oþ hi him sealdon gislas þæt hi of ðæs cinges anwealde faran woldon.
And se cing hæfde fundon þæt him man sæt wið on healfe Sæfern muþan westan fram Wealum, east oð Afene muþan, þæt hi ne dorston þæt land nawern on þa healfe gesecan.
Þa bestælon hi hi þeah nihtes upp æt sumum twam cirrum, æt oþrum cyrre be eastan Weced, æt oðrum cyrre æt Portlocan.
Þa sloh hi mon æt ægþrum cyrre, þæt hyra feawa onweg comon buton þa ane þe ðær ut ætswymman mihton to þam scypum.

And þa sæton hi ute on ðam iglande æt Steapan Reolice oþ þone ferst þe hi wurdon swiðe metelease, and monige menn hungre acwolen, forðon hine mihton nanne mete geræcan, foron ða þanon to Deomedum and þanon to Yrlande, and þis wæs on hærfest.
And þa æfter ðam on þam ilcan gere ætforan Martines mæssan þa for Eadweard cing to Buccingahamme mid his fyrde and sæt þæriiiiwucan and geworhte þa byrig buta on ægðer healfe eas ær he þanon fore.
And þurcytel eorl hine gesohte him to hlaforde, and þa eorlas ealle, and ða yldestan menn þe to Bedaforda hyrdon, and eac mænige þara ðe to Hamtune hyrdon.
Her Ealhswið forðferde.
And þy ilcan gere wæs þæt gefeoht æt þam Holme Cantwara and þara Deniscra.
Her mona aþystrode.
Her ætywde cometa.
Her wæs Ligcester geedniwod.
Her wæs Sancte Oswaldes lic gelæded of Beardanigge on Myrce.
On þysum gere Engle and Dene gefuhton æt Teotanheale, and Engle sige namon.
And þy ilcan geare æðelflæd getimbrede þa burh æt Bremesbyrig.
Ða ðæs oþres geares gefor æþered Myrcna hlaford.
Her com æþelflæd Myrcna hlæfdige on þone halgan æfen Inuentione Sancte Crucis to Scergeate and þær ða burh getimbrede, and þæs ilcan geares þa æt Bricge.
Her Gode forgyfendum for æþelflæd Myrcna hlæfdige mid eallum Myrcum to Tamaweorðige and þa burh þær getimbrede on foreweardne sumor, and þæs foran to hlafmæssan þa æt Stæfforda.
Þa ðæs oþre geare þa æt Eadesbyrig on foreweardne sumor, and þæs ilcan geres eft on ufeweardne hærfest þa æt Wæringwicum.
Þa ðæs oþre geare on ufan midne winter þa æt Cyricbyrig and þa æt Weardbyrig, and ðy ilcan gere foran to middan wintra þa æt Rumcofan.

Her wæs Ecgbriht abbud unscyldig ofslegen foran to middan sumera onxvi Kalendas Iulii, þy ilcan dæge wæs Sancte Ciricius tid þæs ðroweres, mid his geferum, and ðæs embe þreo niht sende æþelflæd fyrde on Wealas and abræc Brecenan mere and þær genam ðæs cinges wif feower and ðritiga sume.

Her æþelflæd Myrcna hlæfdige, Gode fultumgendum, foran to hlæfmæssan begeat þa burh mid eallum þam ðe þærto hyrde þe ys haten Deoraby, þær wæron eac ofslegene hyre þegna feower ðe hire be sorge wæron binnan þam gatum.
Her heo begeat on hire geweald mid Godes fultume on foreweardne gear gesybsumlice þa burh æt Ligraceastre, and se mæsta dæl þæs herges þe ðær to hirde wearð underþeoded.
And hæfdon eac Eforwicingas hire gehaten, and sume on wedde geseald, sume mid aþum gefæstnod þæt hi on hyre rædenne beon woldon.

Ac swiðe hrædlice þæs ðe hi þæs geworden hæfde, heo geforxiinihtun ær middan sumera binnan Tamaweorþige ðy eahtoþan geare þæs ðe heo Myrcna anweald mid riht hlaforddome healdende wæs, and hyre lic lið binnan Gleawcestre on þam east portice Sancte Petres cyrcean.
Her eac wearð æþeredes dohtor Myrcna hlafordes ælces anwealdes on Myrcum benumen, and on Westsexe aleded þrim wucum ær middan wintra, seo wæs haten ælfwyn.
Her Eadweard cing getimbrede þa burh æt Cledemuþan.
Her Eadweard cing gefor on Myrcum æt Fearndune, and ælfwerd his sunu swiðe hraðe þæs gefor æt Oxnaforda, and hira lic lið æt Wintanceastre.
And æþelstan wæs of Myrcum gecoren to cinge and æt Cingestune gehalgod, and he geaf his sweostor <Ofsæ> <Ealdseaxna> <cynges> <suna>.
Her for æþelstan cing on Scotland, ægþer ge mid landhere ge mid scyphere, and his micel oferhergode.

Her æþelstan cing forðferde onvi Kalendas Novembrisembexlwintra butan anre nihte þæs ðe ælfred cing forðferde, and Eadmund æþeling feng to rice, and he wæs ðaxviiiwintre, and æþelstan cing ricsodexiiiigear andxwucan.
Her Eadmund cing onfeng Onlafes cinges æt fullwihte, and þy ilcan gere embe tela micelne ferst he onfeng Rægnoldes cinges æt bisceopes handa.
Her Eadmund cing geeode eall Norðhymbraland him to gewealde, and aflymde utiicingas, Anlaf Sihtrices sunu and Rægnold Cuþferðes sunu.
Her Eadmund cing oferhergode eall Cumbraland and hit let eall to Malculme Scotta cinge on þæt gerad þæt he wære his midwyrhta ægþer ge on sæ ge on lande.

Her Eadmund cing forðferde on Sancte Augustines mæssedæg, and he hæfde rice seofoþe healf gear, and þa feng Eadred æþeling his broðor to rice, and gerad eall Norðhymbraland him to gewealde, and Scottas him aþas sealdon þæt hi eall woldon þæt he wolde.
Her forðferde Eadred cing, and Eadwi feng to rice.
Her Eadgar æþeling feng to Myrcnarice.
Her forðferde Eadwig cing, and Eadgar his broþor feng to rice, ægðer ge on Wessexum ge on Myrcum ge on Norðhymbrum, and he wæs þaxviwintre.

Her forðferde Oskitel arcebisceop, se wæs ærest to Dorkeceastre to leodbisceope gehalgod and eft to Eoferwicceastre be Eadweardes cinges unnan and be ealra his witena þæt he wæs to arcebisceope gehalgod.

And he wæs twa andxxiiwintra bisceop, and he forðferde on Ealra Halgena mæssenihtxnihton ær Martines mæssan æt Tame, and þurkytel abbud, his mæg, ferede þæs bisceopes lic to Bedanforda forþan ðe he wæs þa þær abbud on þone timan.
Her forðferde Eadmund æþeling.
Her on þys geare wæs se miccla hungor on Angelcynne.

Her wæs þæt myccle gemot æt Kyrtlingtune ofer Eastron, and ðær forðferde Sidemann bisceop on hrædlican deaþe onii Kalendas Maius, se wæs Defnascire bisceop, and he wilnode þæt his licræst sceolde beon æt Cridiantune æt his bisceopstole.

Þa het Eadweard cing and Dunstan arcebisceop þæt hine man ferede to Sancta Marian mynstre, þæt his æt Abbandune, and man eac swa dyde, and he is eac arwyrðlice bebyrged on þa norðhealfe on Sanctus Paulus portice.
Her on þysum geare wearð Eadweard cyning gemartyrad, and æþelred æþeling his broðor feng to þam rice, and he wæs on þam ylcan geare to cinge gehalgod.
On þam geare forðferde Alfwold, se wæs bisceop on Dorsætum, and his lic lið on þam mynstre æt Scireburnan.
On þys geare wæs æþelred to cininge gehalgod on þone sunnandæig feowertyne niht ofer Eastron æt Cingestune, and þær wæron æt his halgunge twegen ercebisceopas and tyn leodbisceopas.
Þy ilcan geare wæs gesewen blodig wolcen on oftsiðas on fyres gelicnesse, and þæt wæs swyðost on middeniht oþywed, and swa on mistlice beamas wæs gehiwod, þonne hit dagian wolde, þonne toglad hit.

Her on þys geare wæs æþelgar abbod to bisceope gehalgod onvi Nonas Maito þam bisceopstole æt Seolesigge, and on þam ylcan geare wæs Suðhamtun forhergod fram scipherige and seo burhwaru mæst ofslegen and gehæft, and þy ilcan geare wæs Tenetland gehergod, and þy ilcan geare wæs Legeceasterscir gehergod fram norð scipherige.
Her on þys geare wæs Sancte Petroces stow forhergod, and þy ilcan geare wæs micel hearm gedon gehwær be þam særiman, ægþer ge on Defenum ge on Wealum.
And on þam ylcan geare forðferde ælfstan bisceop on Wiltunscire, and his lic lið on þam mynstre æt Abbandune, and Wulfgar feng þa to ðam bisceopdome.
And on þam ylcan geare forðferde Womær abbod on Gent.
Her on þys geare comon upp on Dorsætumiiiscypu wicinga and hergodon on Portlande.

Þy ilcan geare forbarn Lundenbyrig, and on þam ylcan geare forðferdon twegen ealdormenn, æþelmær on Hamtunscire and Eadwine on Suðseaxum, and æþelmæres lic lið on Wintanceastre on Niwan mynstre and Eadwines on þam mynstre æt Abbandune.
Þæs ylcan geares forðferdon twa abbodessan on Dorsætum, Herelufu on Sceaftesbyrig and Wulfwin on Werham.

And þy ilcan geare for Odda Romana casere to Greclande and þa gemette he þara Sarcena mycele fyrde cuman upp of sæ, and woldon þa faran on hergoð on þæt cristene folc, and þa gefeaht se casere wið hi, and þær wæs micel wæl geslægen on gehwæþere hand, and se casere ahte wælstowe geweald, and hwæðere he þær wæs micclum geswenced ær he þanon hwurfe, and þa he hamweard for.
Þa forðferde his broþorsunu, se wæs haten Odda, and he wæs Leodulfes sunu æþelinges, and se Leodulf wæs þæs ealdan Oddan sunu and Eadweardes cininges dohtor sunu.
Her forðferde Ælfhere ealdorman, and feng Ælfric to þam ilcan ealdordomscipe.
And Benedictus papa forþferde.
Her forðferde Aþelwold bisceop onKalendas Agustus.
Her wæs ælfric ealdorman ut adræfed of earde.
And on þam ilcan geare wæs Eadwine to abbode gehalgod to þam mynstre æt Abbandune.
Her se cyning fordyde þæt bisceoprice æt Hrofeceastre.
Her com ærest se micla yrfcwealm on Angelcyn.
Her wæs Wecedport geheregod, and Goda se Defenisca þegen ofslagen and mycel wæl mid him.
Her gefor Dunstan <arcebisceop>, and æþelgar <bisceop> feng æfter him to arcestole, and he lytle hwile æfter þæm lyfode, butanigear andiiimonþas.
Her Sigeric wæs gehalgod to arcebisceop, and Eadwine abbud forðferde, and Wulfgar abbud feng to þam rice.
Her wæs Gypeswic gehergod, and æfter þon swiðe raðe wæs Brihtnoð ealdorman ofslegen æt Mældune.
And on þam geare man gerædde þæt man geald ærest gafol Denescum mannum for ðam miclan brogan þe hi worhton be ðam særiman, þæt wæs ærestxðusend punda.
Þæne ræd gerædde ærest Syric arcebisceop.
Her Oswald se haliga arcebisceop forlet þis lif and geferde þæt heofenlice, and æþelwine ealdorman gefor on þam ilcan geare.

Þa gerædde se cyning and ealle his witan þæt man gegadrede ealle ða scipu þe ahtes wæron to Lundenbyrig, and se cyning þa betæhte þy fyrde to lædenne ælfrice ealdormen and þorede eorlle and ælfstane bisceope and æscwige bisceope, and sceoldon cunnian, meahton hy þone here ahwær utan <betreppan>.

Þa sende se ealdorman ælfric and het warnian ðone here, and þa on ðære nihte þe hy on ðone dæig togædere fon sceoldan, þa sceoc he on niht fram þære fyrde him sylfum to myclum bysmore, and se here ða ætbærst butan an scyp þær man ofsloh.
And þa gemette se here ða scypu on Eastenglum and of Lundene, and hi ðær ofgeslogan micel wæl and þæt scyp genaman eall gewæpnod and gewædod þæt se ealdorman on wæs.
And ða æfter Oswaldes arcebisceopes forðsiþe feng Ealdulf abbud to Eoforwicstole and to Wigernaceastre, and Kenulf to ðam abbudrice æt Buruh.
Her on þis geare wæs Bebbanburuh abrocen and mycel herehyþe ðær genumen, and æfter þam com to Humbran muþan se here and ðær mycel yfel worhton ægþer ge on Lindesige ge on Norðhymbran.
Þa gegaderede man swiðe micle fyrde, and þa hi togædere gan sceoldon, þa onstealdan þa heretogan ærest þone fleam, þæt wæs Fræna and Godwine and Fryþegyst.
On þyssum geare het se cyning ablendan ælfgar, ælfrices sunu ealdormannes.

Her on ðissum geare com Anlaf and Swegen to Lundenbyrig on Natiuitas Sanct<../images/etail.gif>Mari<../images/etail.gif>midiiiiand hundnigontigum scypum, and hi ða on þa buruh fæstlice feohtende wæron and eac hi mid fyre ontendon woldan, ac hi þær geferdon maran hearm and yfel þonne hi æfre wendon þæt him ænig buruhwaru gedon sceolde.
Ac seo halige Godes modor on þam dæge hire mildheortnesse þære buruhware gecydde, and hi ahredde wið heora feondum.

And hi þanone ferdon and worhton þæt mæste yfel ðe æfre æni here gedon meahte on bærnette and heregunge and on manslyhtum ægþer ge be ðam særiman and on Eastseaxum and on Kentlande and on Suðseaxum and on Hamtunscire, and æt neaxtan namon him hors and ridon him swa wide swa hi woldan and unasecgendlice yfel wyrcgende wæron.

Þa gerædde se cyning and his witan þæt him man to sende and him behet gafol and metsunge wið þon ðe hi þære heregunge geswicon, and hi ða þæt underfengon, and com þa eall se here to Hamtune and ðær wintersetl namon, and hi mon þær fedde geond eall Westseaxenarice, and him mon geald feosxviðusend punda.

Þa sende se cyning æfter Anlafe cynge ælfeah bisceop and æþelweard ealdorman, and man gislude þa hwile into þam scipum, and hi ða læddon Anlaf mid miclum wurðscipe to þam cyninge to Andeferan, and se cyning æþelred his onfeng æt bisceopes handa and him cynelice gifode, and him þa Anlaf behet, swa he hit eac gelæste þæt he næfre eft to Angelcynne mid unfriðe cuman nolde.
Her on þissum geare æteowde cometa se steorra, and Sigeric arcebisceop forðferde.
Her on þissum geare wæs ælfric gehalgod to arcebisceope to Cristes cyrican.

Her on ðissum geare ferde se here abutan Defenanscire into Sæfern muðan and þær heregodon ægðer ge on Cornwealum and on Norðwealum and on Defenum, and eodon him þa up æt Wecedport and þær micel yfel worhton on bærnette and on mannslihtum, and æfter þam wendon eft abutan Penwiðsteort on þa suðhealfe and wendon þa into Tamer muðan and eodon þa up oð hi comon to Hlydanforda, and ælc þing bærndon and slogon þe hi gemitton, and Ordulfes mynster Tæfingstoc forbærndon and unasecgendlice herehyðe mid him to scypon brohton.

Her wende se here eft eastweard into From muðan and þær æghwær up eodon swa wide swa hi woldon into Dorsæton, and man oft fyrde ongean hi gaderede, ac sona swa hi togædere gan sceoldan, þonne wearð þær æfre ðuruh sum þing fleam astiht, and æfre hi æt ende sige ahton.
And þonne oðre hwile lagon him on Wihtlande and æton him þa hwile of Hamtunscire and of Suðseaxum.

Her com se here eft abutan into Temese and wendon þa up andlang <Medwægan> and to Hrofeceastre, and com þa seo Centisce fyrd þar ongean, and hi ða þær fæste togædere fengon, ac wala þæt hi to raðe bugon and flugon.
And þa Deniscan ahton wælstowe geweald, and namon þa hors and ridan swa hwider swa hi sylf woldon and forneah ealle Westkentingas fordydon and forheregodon.

Ða rædde se cyning wið his witan þæt man sceolde mid scypfyrde and eac mid landfyrde hym ongean faran, ac þa ða scipu gearwe wæron, þa ylcodan þa deman fram dæge to dæge and swencte þæt earme folc þæt on ðam scipon læg, and a, swa hit forðwerdre beon sceolde, swa wæs hit lætre fram anre tide to oþre.
And a hi leton heora feonda werod wexan, and a man rymde fram þære sæ, and hi foron æfre forð æfter.
And þonne æt ðam ende ne beheold hit nan þing, seo scypfyrding ne seo landfyrding, buton folces geswinc and feos spylling and heora feonda forðbyldung.
Her on þisum geare se cyning ferde in to Cumerlande and hit swiðe neah eall forheregode, and his scypu wendon ut abutan Legceaster and sceoldan cuman ongean hine, ac hi ne meahton.
Þa geheregodon hi Monige, and se unfriðflota wæs ðæs sumeres gewend to Ricardes rice.
Her com se here to Exan muðan, and eodon þa up to ðære byrig and ðær fæstlice feohtende wæron, ac him mon swiðe heardlice wiðstod.
Þa wendon hi geond þæt land and dydan ealswa hi bewuna wæron, slogon and bærndon.

Þa gesomnede man þær ormæte fyrde Defenisces folces and Sumersætisces folces, and hi ða tosomne comon æt Peonnho, and sona swa hi togædere coman, þa beah þæt folc, and hi ðær mycel wæll ofslogan and ridon þa ofer þæt land, and wæs æfre heora æftra siþ wyrsa þonne se æra, and mid him ða micle herehuðe to scipon brohton.
And ðanon wendon into Wihtlande and ðær him ferdon abutan swa swa hi sylf woldan, and him nanþing ne wiðstod, ne him to ne dorste scyphere on sæ, ne landfyrd, ne eodon hi swa feor up.
Wæs hit þa on ælce wisan hefig tyme, forðam þe hi næfre hiora yfeles ne geswicon.
Her on ðissum geare se cyning gerædde and his witan þæt man sceolde gafol gyldan þam flotan and frið wið hi niman wið þon þe hi heora yfeles geswican sceoldan.

Þa sende se cyning to þam flotan Leofsige ealdorman, and he ða þæs cyninges worde and his witena gryð wið hi gesette, and þæt hi to metsunge fengon and to gafole, and hi ða þæt underfengon, and him mon ða gegealdxxiiiiþusend punda.
Þa on gemang þissum ofsloh Leofsige ealdorman æfic þæs cynges heahgerefan, and se cyng hine ða utode of earde.

And þa on ðam ilcan lenctene com seo hlæfdige Ricardes dohtor hider to lande, and on þam ilcan sumera Ealdulf arcebisceop forðferde, and on þam geare se cyng het ofslean ealle þa Deniscan men þe on Angelcynne wæron, ðis wæs gedon on Britius mæssedæig, forðam þam cyninge wæs gecyd þæt hi woldan hine besyrwan æt his life and siððan ealle his witan and habban siþþan þis rice.
Her wæs Exacester tobrocen þuruh þone Frenciscan ceorl Hugan, ðe seo hlæfdige hire hæfde geset to gerefan, and se here ða þa buruh mid ealle fordyde and micle herehyðe þær genamon.
And on þam ilcan geare eode se here up into Wiltunscire.
Þa <gegaderede> man swiðe micle fyrde of Wiltunscire and of Hamtunscire, and swiðe anrædlice wið þæs heres werd wæran.
Þa sceolde se ealdorman ælfric lædan þa fyrde, ac he teah ða forð his ealdan wrencas.

Sona swa hi wæron swa gehende þæt ægðer here on oþerne hawede, þa gebræd he hine seocne and ongan hine brecan to spiwenne and cwæð þæt he gesicled wære, and swa þæt folc becyrde þæt he lædan sceolde, swa hit gecweden ys, þonne se heretoga wacað, þonne bið eall se here swiðe gehindrad.

Þa Swegen geseah þæt hi anræde næron and þæt hi ealle toforan, þa lædde he his here into Wiltune, and hi þa buruh geheregodon and forbærndon, and eode him þa to Searbyrig and þanone eft to sæ ferde þær he wiste his yðhengestas.
Her com Swegen mid his flotan to Norðwic and þa buruh eall geheregode and forbærnde.

Þa gerædde Ulfcytel wið ða witan on Eastenglum þæt hit betere wære þæt mon wið þone here friðes ceapode ær hi to mycelne hearm on ðam earde gedydon, forðæm hi unwæres comon and he fyrst næfde þæt he his fyrde gegaderede.
Þa under ðam griþe þe him betweonan beon sceolde, þa bestæl se here up of scypon and wendon hiora fore to þeodforda.
Þa Ulfcytel þæt undergeat, þa sende he þæt mon sceolde þa scipu toheawan, ac hi abruðan þa ðe he to þohte, and he ða gegaderede his fyrde digolice swa he swyðost mihte.
And se here com þa to ðeodforda binnaniiiwucan þæs ðe hi ær geheregodon Norðwic, and þær binnoniniht wæron and þa buruh heregodon and forbærndon.
Þa on mergen, ða hi to scipon woldon, þa cwom Ulfcytel mid his werode þæt hi ðær togædere fon sceoldon, and hi þær togædere fæstlice fengon, and micel wæl ðær on ægðre hand gefeol.

Ðær wearð Eastengla folces seo yld ofslagen, ac gif þæt fulle mægen ðær wære, ne eodon hi næfre eft to scipon, swa hi sylfe sædon, þæt hi næfre wyrsan handplegan on Angelcynne ne gemitton þonne Ulfcytel him to brohte.
Her on þissum geare wæs se micla hungor geond Angelcyn swylce nan man ær ne gemunde swa grimne.
And se flota ðæs geares gewende of þissum gearde to Denemarce and lytelne fyrst let þæt he eft ne com.
Her forðferde ælfric <arcebisceop>, and ælfeah <bisceop> feng æfter him to ðam arcestole.
